page.title: 07Employment In Illogan.
page.content: There are tin{mines}at{Wheal Jane}and {Crofty.}Students from abroad learn mining at the{Camborne School of {Mines.}They are doing a Hot Rock Project.They pump water down into the rock to heat it.{Compair}is a factory which makes mining equipment.{Farmers grow wheat and vegetables and keep cows for milk and beef.Farms are small.{Fishermen}catch mackerel and pollack and have crab pots.In the Summer there are tourists.People work in shops,hotels and campsites. {Unemployment}is a problem and rises in Winter because many people close their shops as there are not so many {tourists.}In our area about{22%}of the population is unemployed.{Factories} are closing down and some families move up country.{
